SELECT /* com.deft.crud.admin.adminemployee.model.dao.AdminEmployeeMapper#selectJobList() */ JOB_CODE , JOB_NAME FROM TBL_JOB WHERE JOB_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT /* com.deft.crud.admin.adminemployee.model.dao.AdminEmployeeMapper#selectDeptList() */ DEPT_CODE , DEPT_NAME FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT /* com.deft.crud.admin.adminemployee.model.dao.AdminEmployeeMapper#selectAuthorityList() */ AUTHORITY , DEPT_NAME FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.admin.adminemployee.model.dao.AdminEmployeeMapper#selectManagerList() */ E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME FROM TBL_EMP_INFO E JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON ( E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE ) WHERE D.DEPT_CODE = #{ deptCode } AND AUTHORITY = '담당자'
